channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Atmosphere Announce New Album Jestures: Hear “Really” & “Velour”
item.description: 🚀 Dive into the world of Atmosphere with their fresh sounds on "Really" and "Velour" from their upcoming album Jestures! 🎶 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Kelly Osbourne Breaks Silence After Dad Ozzy’s Death With ‘Changes’ Lyrics
item.description: 💜🎶 Sending love to Kelly Osbourne as she honors her dad Ozzy with poignant 'Changes' lyrics. Music truly heals. #FamilyForever 🤘

item.title: Pearly Drops – “End Credits”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into dreamy vibes with @PearlyBand's new track "End Credits"! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert #IndieMusic

item.title: Watch the First Trailer for New Movie Spinal Tap II: The End Continues
item.description: 🎸 Rock on! 🤘 Get ready to jam with the first trailer for Spinal Tap II: The End Continues! Are you ready to rock and roll? #SpinalTapII #Rockumentary

item.title: Confidence Man & JADE – “gossip”
item.description: 🎶 New banger alert! Confidence Man & JADE drop “gossip” – get ready to dance! 💃🕺 #MusicMonday #NewMusicAlert
